title: An unknown directx error has occured
body: Recently my game has been giving me the direct x error after playing 4 or 5 games. I then have to restart my computer which takes 5-10 minutes and I've gotten three low priority queues. I have tried completely deleting the game and redownloading it. I have tried just about every fix I could find, and I need help.

replies.body: i have the same problem .. i redownloading the game everyday for 4 for 5 hours and the next day (AppCrash) :/
List OS, hardware specs, driver versions.
